short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple click2dial relying on your operating system's capabilities to handle tel-links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a simple click2dial handler for your desk or softphone?

Are you tired of CTI/click2dial extensions requiring that you use a very specific phone system? 

You can stop searching! This extension will take the number you've highlighted and handle it like a "tel:"-Link, passing it onto your operating system to complete the call.

So if you already have a working handler for "tel:"-Links, this will help you make quick CTI calls.

No highlighting of numbers on the active page and only a minimum of number processing is happening:
- All characters other than numbers, +, ( and ) are removed
- If the remaining number starts with a + and has a (0) in the number, the (0) will be dropped.
